attributes.action: secure a deal at  Copenhagen to cut power station emissions worldwide by 30%  by 2020.and to zero by 2030
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"We the undersigned recognise that power stations emit more carbon dioxide than any other sector- a third of all global emissions.
As a first step towards making our climate safe for all, we call for the Copenhagen Conference in December 2009 to agree urgent cuts in power station emissions.
We call on the British government to lead negotiations for a cut in global power sector emissions of at least one third by 2020, as a move towards zero emissions from this sector by 2030.
Furthermore, we call for an international inspectorate, along the lines of the International Nuclear Inspectorate, to ensure these emissions are permanently monitored and capped"
